name: Offroad PRO: Clash of 4x4s
description:
Customize your rig. Feel the mud and dirt under the tires. Play with friends and compete with players all over the world. Show off your setup and explore the open world.

MULTIPLAYER
Offroad PRO allows you to play with up to 8 players, to discover, compete or cooperate on a map of over 16 square miles. Feel like playing solo - we got you covered, you can do all the activities on your own. But trust us, once you get that rush of adrenaline while racing your rig against different players, it’d be hard to play solo again.

EXPLORE & EXPERIENCE
With one of the biggest and most detailed maps among all driving games on mobile devices, with over 500 off road activities hidden on the map, mud, dirt, ramps, lakes, rivers, hidden villages, observatory, sunken tanker and an old mine, Offroad PRO delivers countless hours of fun and addictive gameplay. Test your rig, discover hidden treasures, race in variety of off-road tracks or simply drive around and have fun with friends. Offroad PRO delivers real off road open world experience. On top of that we’ve simulated real driving physics for each vehicle.

CUSTOMIZE
Offroad PRO is about customization as much as it is about driving cars and 4x4 trucks. Anyone, who ever dipped his toe in a real off-road activity knows, that you spend us much time in the garage twerking, fixing and tuning up your set-up as much as inside a driver's cabin on an off road track. So don’t worry - we got you covered. With several different vehicle classes such as ATV, UTV, quad, crawler, classic 4x4 jeep and special cars and trucks everyone will find a great setup to start with. Then comes the fun part - control damping, stiffness, travel and dozen more parameters, swap suspension and engines, change tires, add lights, bullbars, roof racks and many more. Customize your looks by changing paints, adding vinyls, or grab a gas tank and camping gear on the roof. The options are countless, so build your rig now and show that you’re the real off road professional.

Note: If you choose to join as an Offroad PRO member, you are agreeing to an auto-renewing subscription plan that will automatically be charged every month through your account for $4.99.
